definitions.definition: To relax ; to spend time lazily; to stand, sit, or recline , in an indolent manner.
examples: We like to spend our Sundays lounging about at home in our pyjamas.

definitions.definition: To walk or go in a leisurely manner.

main_definition: ( intransitive ) To relax ; to spend time lazily; to stand, sit, or recline , in an indolent manner.
secondary_definitions: To walk or go in a leisurely manner.
